reviewText: Turner is my favor watercolor artists.  I have studied his history and many of his paintings.  I have had the opportunity recently to see three of his paintings at the Hunter Museum in Pasadena, California.
I enjoyed watching this production but found it very short, also it did not show many of Turner's works.

The haunting work of Turner is explaineed and beautifully presented in this video. History comes alive in the art of Turner, as well as the narration. It's breathtaking, and a great gift for anyone who loves art or history. One does not need an esoteric background to be mesmerized by Turner's legacy.
A very well done overview of JMW Turner's work and history of the man. It gives the viewer a good indication of just how much impact this artist had and still has in the field.
